|brand = DirecTV |model = DCAW1R0-01 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = Wireless Module |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 24, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/DirecTV_DCAW1R0-01_Wireless_Module |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 1a30 |device_id = 0710 |subvendor_id = 1a30 |subdevice_id = 0711 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NKR-DTVDCCK |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = A8:54:B2

|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
